patthana20.4:1.1: Nasaññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
patthana20.4:2.1: Naganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
patthana20.4:3.1: Naoghaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca ogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
patthana20.4:4.1: Nayogaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca yogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …pe….
patthana20.4:5.1: Nanīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana20.4:6.1: Hetuyā nava …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate nava.
patthana20.4:7.1: Naparāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca parāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana20.4:8.1: Hetuyā pañca …pe… vipāke ekaṃ …pe… avigate pañca. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
